reviews.title: Show stopper, Incredible staff, service and criteria
reviews.text: Cant thank my AMAZING BDM Joanna Ridgeway enough for all her hard work on complex purchase case which was submitted on the 2nd or September and completed on the 1st October. Thank you Joanna Ridgeway, Sophie Jagpal underwriter, made myself and clients family happy with efficiency of application!

reviews.title: Friendly company.
reviews.text: Decent mortgage rates, maybe not the best on offer - but more importantly good advice and customer service. A friendly company who are easy to deal with.

reviews.title: First class customer service!
reviews.text: Not the most competitive rates on the market - as they freely admit - but great customer service and explanation of their products - and advice on which product is best suited to you - more than makes up for this.

reviews.title: Great mortgage advice and service.
reviews.text: Friendly and sensible mortgage advice given. Not the most competitive rates on the market - which they admit - but the overall customer experience makes up for this in my opinion.

reviews.title: Unprofessional People making life like hell
reviews.text: I was trying to get mortgage. first of all there SLA is always 5 working days. like if they ask for any information and you provide it immediately you would get feedback after 1 week. The fail to understand the documents and asks sames explanation again and again wasting your time. I would not recommend it. They exaggerate such a way that they are the best and they only provide the best rates. But its completely false. please shop around. Use this company as Last option

reviews.title: Slow and difficult to get responses
reviews.text: 7 months and still no decision. I believe Tipton lost original mortgage application. Broker has to deal with an agent who deals with underwriters so communication takes an age to filter through. Keep asking for information one item at a time, now asking for information previously supplied. Chain is about to collapse as a result of their lack of action. House being purchased has been put back on market due to vendor fearing losing her purchase so about to lose purchase unless someone revives the dead snail powering Tipton mortgages.

reviews.title: Friendly Building Society
reviews.text: Always good communication with friendly advice given.

reviews.title: Outstanding first experience
reviews.text: My husband and I are looking to get a mortgage in the next few months so put the feelers out (as I had historic issues due to redundancy) and the advisor that emailed me back, Zoe was detailed in her reply and really put my mind at ease! When we come to get the mortgage The Tipton and Zoe will be my first port of call!! Just outstanding service especially in the midst of the pandemic too.

reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more
reviews.text: Welcoming, efficient and reassuring service, nothing else to say.

reviews.title: Extremely helpful and professional
reviews.text: Tipton were so helpful when we were buying our home. I always spoke to the same member of the team and nothing was ever too much trouble. They have also been excellent in the two years that we have had out mortgage with them. I couldn’t recommend them enough.

reviews.title: A rather pleasant experience all around!
reviews.text: When I opened an account with Tipton & Crossley I found that the process was straight forward the staff were extremely friendly and professional. Which is what you want. Their help to buy ISA will make all the difference and all the information they provided about it really helped. I'm really looking forward to the opportunity to get on the property ladder. I'd definitely recommend them to any and everybody.

reviews.title: Perfect every step of the way
reviews.text: Zoe made the process as simple and as smooth as we could have imagined. As first time buyers we thought it would be full of jargon and stressful. Zoe made it easier than popping to the supermarket and we can’t thank her enough!

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.text: I love The Tipton. So many different types of mortgages i.e. Expat BTL, Holiday Homes, RIO and more!

reviews.title: Great communications, friendly staff.
reviews.text: A range of mortgage options explained, no hard sell just clear and concise information.

reviews.title: Nothing is too much effort
reviews.text: The team at Tipton and Coseley went above and beyond to help us with our mortgage needs even when our first house fell through. ZOE was incredible. So understanding even when I was so upset. They helped us through to the very end and even sent us a beautiful new home card when we finally got in our forever home. Their customer care is the best I have ever come across and highly recommend to all.

reviews.title: overall not bad
reviews.text: I have run into some problems but overall they are quite friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: Friendly, knowledgeable staff.
reviews.text: I would normally shop around for mortgages like I do with most other products i.e. insurance etc. But the staff at T&C are open and honest (will admit if their products are not at market-leading rates for instance), but will always take into account your personal situation, and provide a range of options based on your requirements.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, good rates
reviews.text: Always helpful and friendly, nothing too much trouble

reviews.title: Professional and Personable
reviews.text: Been a mortgage holder with Tipton for well over a decade now and really wouldn't want to change to any other Lender. It's so refreshing being able to ring the branch directly without having the nuisance of a call centre. They certainly deserve to win!

reviews.title: Friendly professional advice and great service
reviews.text: The whole team are so professional and always willing to go the extra mile to help. Would recommend to anyone.

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.text: The service I received was very efficient . The staff were polite helpful and understanding . Fantastic all round .

reviews.title: Friendly and personal service
reviews.text: This is a great company with a local feel. You can speak to the same person over the years (if this is the type of service that suits you) as they seem to have lower staff turnover than some of the bigger providers. They will admit when they are unable to match the rates of the big providers, but give honest and sensible advice, with your financial safety and peace of mind at the forefront of their decisions.

reviews.title: Launched an amazing new App
reviews.text: You are now able to onboard as a new customer on the App and open new accounts, transfer funds etc. Major Achievement for such a small Building Society

reviews.title: Great Customer Experience
reviews.text: Always willing to assist and help. Good savings products.

reviews.title: Amazing Service - always reliable
reviews.text: The society has always been amazing in all the years I've been a customer. I started off with having an account at 7 years old, and have held accounts all the way up to 18. Staff are always happy to help and so welcoming! Cannot fault the service

reviews.title: Easy, no-nonsense advice
reviews.text: Nothing is too much trouble trouble at the Tipton, and there is always help on hand. When I went in to open a savings account, I asked the girls on the counter for some advice, which they were more than happy to do. Nothing is too much trouble and the advice I did receive was straight to the point and cut out all of the jargon. Perfect!
